Header.title: Accelerate Your Nursing Career
Header.paragraph: Our accelerated program equips you with the skills to lead in healthcare.

paragraph: Omoze Nursing Educators (ONE) is a leading provider of accelerated nursing education programs. We're committed to helping aspiring nurses achieve their goals and make a positive impact on healthcare.
Why: A first of its kind in Africa, our program is designed to fast-track your nursing education, allowing you to enter the workforce sooner without compromising on the quality of your training. We also provide you with avenue to explore the opportunities that are present in the profession of Nursing. ONE does not only base its focus on training you, but also prepares you on how to navigate through the challenges of your aspiring profession, so as to become one of the best therein.
Why2: Our program combines advanced theoretical instruction with hands-on clinical practice, ensuring that you are well-prepared to meet the challenges of modern nursing with the service of our dedicated educators and seasoned professionals who bring real-world experience into the classroom, providing you with valuable insights and mentorship.

When you gain admission through ONE and graduate from the program, you are almost guaranteed of a job after you pass your licensure examination at our Elite Healthcare Staffing and Oasis In-Home Care offices or through our partnering companies across the US, Canada and the UK. We will not rest until you are placed.

Services.name: Pre-Nursing Diploma (if applicable)
Services.text: One-year program for non-health related degree holders.

Services.name: B.S. Nursing Degree
Services.text: Accelerated 18-month program leading to a B.S. Nursing degree.
